original_text:
My back is filled with searing pain;
    there is no health in my body.
korean_text: 내 허리에 열기가 가득하고 내 살에 성한 곳이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: My back is filled with searing pain
sentences.korean_translation: 내 등은 찌르는 듯한 고통으로 가득합니다

sentences.original_text: there is no health in my body
